alert.note: Alert for Coastal Camden; Inland Camden (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 20 at 7:03PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Nassau, north central Duval and southeastern Camden Counties through 730 PM EDT... At 703 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles northeast of Callahan, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... St. Marys, Fernandina Beach, Yulee, Amelia City and Dungeness. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
